job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Textmetrics offers a highly innovative online service that is already used by many of the larger organizations in the Netherlands. And you as a Senior Python Developer can play an essential role in that!
   Read more
   Apply now
   We are Textmetrics, the innovative AI platform that allows you to generate and optimize texts in a controlled way. This way, all your texts meet your organization's requirements and connect with your target audience. Through our platform we help make organizations more inclusive!

   Our office is located in the center of Arnhem. We are flexible when it comes to working in the office or from home. We are a scale-up, we have already passed the start-up phase and are growing. To help with this growth, we are looking for a senior python developer.

   Are you the person we are looking for?
   We are looking for a senior python developer (male/female/diverse)! We are looking for someone who likes to further develop our innovative software and create new functionalities for customers. You will translate customer needs into new functionality and also develop these functionalities.

   You will be responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining high-performance Python applications. Furthermore, you have knowledge of object-oriented programming and can work with various databases such as MongoDB and SQL Server.

   Currently, Textmetrics is integrating many generative AI solutions into its software. Experience with various LLMs such as OpenAI, Gemini or Anthropic and NLP is a plus.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Python Developer

Textmetrics offers a highly innovative online service that is already used by many of the larger organizations in the Netherlands. And you as a Senior Python Developer can play an essential role in that!
   Read more
   Apply now
   We are Textmetrics, the innovative AI platform that allows you to generate and optimize texts in a controlled way. This way, all your texts meet your organization's requirements and connect with your target audience. Through our platform we help make organizations more inclusive!

   Our office is located in the center of Arnhem. We are flexible when it comes to working in the office or from home. We are a scale-up, we have already passed the start-up phase and are growing. To help with this growth, we are looking for a senior python developer.

   Are you the person we are looking for?
   We are looking for a senior python developer (male/female/diverse)! We are looking for someone who likes to further develop our innovative software and create new functionalities for customers. You will translate customer needs into new functionality and also develop these functionalities.

   You will be responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining high-performance Python applications. Furthermore, you have knowledge of object-oriented programming and can work with various databases such as MongoDB and SQL Server.

   Currently, Textmetrics is integrating many generative AI solutions into its software. Experience with various LLMs such as OpenAI, Gemini or Anthropic and NLP is a plus.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development and integration of generative AI solutions, specifically mentioning experience with LLMs like OpenAI, Gemini, and Anthropic, along with NLP. While it mentions Python development and databases, the core focus is on building and optimizing texts using AI, aligning with the definition of a GenAI Engineer who designs, develops, fine-tunes, and deploys applications built on generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'translate customer needs into new functionality' indicates an understanding of business requirements and translating them into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: translate customer needs into new functionality

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'integrating many generative AI solutions' and 'Experience with various LLMs' directly relates to working with generative models.
The phrase 'Experience with various LLMs such as OpenAI, Gemini or Anthropic' points to direct interaction with and potential fine-tuning or application of large language models.
job_tasks.phrase: Experience with various LLMs such as OpenAI, Gemini or Anthropic

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'NLP' (Natural Language Processing) is a core area within generative AI and modeling.
The core responsibility of 'designing, implementing and maintaining high-performance Python applications' falls under traditional software development.
job_tasks.phrase: designing, implementing and maintaining high-performance Python applications

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'create new functionalities for customers' implies building user-facing features within the software.
The statement 'further develop our innovative software' indicates ongoing software engineering work.
The phrase 'maintaining high-performance Python applications' implies a need for ongoing operational support and maintenance of deployed software.

soft_skills.phrase: translate customer needs into new functionality
